title: UpAgain
author: UpAgain
created_time: September 24, 2022, 07:44:40 AMLast edit: September 24, 2022, 07:56:21 AM by UpAgain
content: [W] $500 loan in BTC. Repayment $550. in 3 days. Type of Collateral: My balls.Description: All I have in this world is  my word and my balls and I don't break them for no one.Btc: bc1qhu3r6hc2cy5u0sy4qv4zzxur3qg28ypk05jsj0

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: UpAgain on September 24, 2022, 07:44:40 AM[W] $1100 loan in BTC. Repayment $1200. 1 monthType of Collateral: My balls.Description: All I have in this world is  my word and my balls and I don't break them for no one.What is right? Do you need USDT or BTC? And how much you want to take as a loan either it is 1000$ or 1200$.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Quote from: UpAgain on September 24, 2022, 07:44:40 AMType of Collateral: My balls.According to Google search, it says, the p;rice of BALLS is $0. How do you expect to get $500 loan with collateral of BALLS which have zero value? And what if you can't repay the loan on time? Will the lender be able to sell them? I would say you rather try to sell them locally. Some people may get interested.Quote from: shasan on September 24, 2022, 07:50:19 AMWhat is right? Do you need USDT or BTC? And how much you want to take as a loan either it is 1000$ or 1200$.Do you take all these things as collateral   What else, please?

comments.author: P2PECS
comments.body: Quote from: UpAgain on September 24, 2022, 07:44:40 AM[W] $500 loan in BTC. Repayment $550. in 3 days. Type of Collateral: My balls.This can't be taken seriously. I assume you're asking for the loan because it took you 1 minute to write that and just in case there's someone remotely dumb enough to lend you the money, but I'm certainly not going to be the dumb one.

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: I'm wondering how many of these recent lending board trolls are alts one person.None of them have posted serious requests, but they've posted quite a lot.  Some might be a bit more subtle than this request, but they're all simply trolling the lending board.  It wouldn't surprise me if this is an older member that was slighted by one or more of the lending board regulars.

comments.author: ps34
comments.body: don't flatter yourself direwolf you didn't out me  as i was not this person   i'm not that stupid i guess

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Given the few I've seen have all woken up recently, I'd say at a guess they were farmed and sold some time ago.
